mapper.select: select comp.HIRE_CODE, comp.JOB_CODE, comp.PICK_APPLY_NUM, comp.PICK_CODE, comp.PICK_CTMT, comp.PICK_START, comp.PICK_END, comp.PICK_NUM, comp.PICK_QULIFY, comp.USERNAME, intro.INTRO_LIM, intro.INTRO_NO, hire.HIRE_FIELD, job.JOB_FIELD from comp_pick_info comp join pick_intro intro on comp.pick_code = intro.pick_code join hire_data hire on comp.HIRE_CODE = hire.hire_code join job_data job on comp.job_CODE = job.JOB_CODE

select ucp.COMP_PP_EMAIL, ucp.ENABLED, ucp.COMP_PP_JOB, ucp.COMP_PP_NAME, ucp.COMP_PP_PHONE, ucp.USERNAME, ci.COMP_COUNT, ci.COMP_LOGO, ci.COMP_NAME, ci.COMP_NUM, ci.COMP_YEAR from user_comp_pp ucp join comp_info ci on ucp.username = ci.username

select comp.HIRE_CODE, comp.JOB_CODE, comp.PICK_APPLY_NUM, comp.PICK_CODE, comp.PICK_CTMT, comp.PICK_START, comp.PICK_END, comp.PICK_NUM, comp.PICK_QULIFY, comp.USERNAME, intro.INTRO_LIM, intro.INTRO_NO, hire.HIRE_FIELD, job.JOB_FIELD from comp_pick_info comp join pick_intro intro on comp.pick_code = intro.pick_code join hire_data hire on comp.HIRE_CODE = hire.hire_code join job_data job on comp.job_CODE = job.JOB_CODE where job.job_field = #{job_field}

select ucp.COMP_PP_EMAIL, ucp.COMP_PP_ENABLED, ucp.COMP_PP_JOB, ucp.COMP_PP_NAME, ucp.COMP_PP_PHONE, ucp.COMP_PP_PWD, ucp.USERNAME, ci.COMP_COUNT, ci.COMP_LOGO, ci.COMP_NAME, ci.COMP_NUM, ci.COMP_YEAR from user_comp_pp ucp join comp_info ci on ucp.username = ci.username where ci.comp_name like '%'||#{comp_name}||'%'

select comp.HIRE_CODE, comp.JOB_CODE, comp.PICK_APPLY_NUM, comp.PICK_CODE, comp.PICK_CTMT, comp.PICK_START, comp.PICK_END, comp.PICK_NUM, comp.PICK_QULIFY, comp.USERNAME, intro.INTRO_LIM, intro.INTRO_NO, hire.HIRE_FIELD, job.JOB_FIELD from comp_pick_info comp join pick_intro intro on comp.pick_code = intro.pick_code join hire_data hire on comp.HIRE_CODE = hire.hire_code join job_data job on comp.job_CODE = job.JOB_CODE join like_cart cart on comp.PICK_CODE = cart.PICK_CODE where cart.username = #{username}
